programme.title: Death on the Border
programme.desc: On the U.S.-Mexican border, two women risk their lives to rescue a group of young girls from a sinister human trafficking network.

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Sam Childers (Gerard Butler), a former biker, travels to Africa to establish an orphanage for young victims of war.

programme.title: Bent
programme.desc: A discredited former cop connects a murder case to an elaborate conspiracy involving high-stakes treason.

programme.title: End of a Gun
programme.desc: A former DEA agent (Steven Seagal) strikes a deal to help a mysterious and seductive woman steal $2 million from a sadistic drug lord.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Joey, an alcoholic war veteran assumes a new identity after returning from a traumatic tour in Afghanistan and becomes a vigilante in a bid to atone for his sins.

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: A veteran detective and a rookie cop have to stop a master thief's computer virus before it drains all the funds from a bank's accounts.

programme.title: Steel Dawn
programme.desc: A post-World War III swordsman (Patrick Swayze) defends a desert widow (Lisa Niemi) and her water-treatment farm.

programme.title: Kickboxer
programme.desc: An American kickboxer (Jean-Claude Van Damme) trains with an Asian master (Dennis Chan) to avenge his crippled brother (Dennis Alexio) in Thailand.

programme.title: Kickboxer 2: The Road Back
programme.desc: Asian villains pick a fight with a Los Angeles kickboxer (Sasha Mitchell) whose brother beat them in Bangkok.

programme.title: Kickboxer 3: The Art of War
programme.desc: A Los Angeles martial artist (Sasha Mitchell) goes to Rio de Janeiro and fights to save a girl from a drug lord.

programme.title: Kickboxer 4: The Aggressor
programme.desc: The DEA pits a Los Angeles martial artist (Sasha Mitchell) against a drug lord holding his wife prisoner in Mexico.

programme.title: Kickboxer 5: The Redemption
programme.desc: An American kickboxer (Mark Dacascos) heads to South Africa to find the promoter (James Ryan) responsible for the deaths of two friends.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: Frank Castle, known as the Punisher, ruthlessly demolishes organized crime, but it starts an even bigger war.

programme.title: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: The living dead regroup above while humans (Lori Cardille, Terry Alexander, Joseph Pilato) sweat it out below in a Florida missile silo.

programme.title: Haywire
programme.desc: After a successful mission to free a Chinese hostage, a highly trained operative (Gina Carano) is betrayed and left for dead by someone in her own agency.
